body_html: PS, this is a sign of missing functionality in TensorFlow - there's no stand-alone way to configure some process-global settings, such as GPU Allocator and Eigen threadpool. Instead they get configured based on ConfigProto passed to the first tf.Session() call. This is a bit confusing -- first tf.Session() call and second tf.Session can get different values, and it seems right now the second set of values is ignored. @mrry
